::Nightlight/Windlord::

Nightlight opened her eyes and tried to find out what was the thing 
that was making so much noyses and she saw a nice scared face... She 
tried to move her wings  but she felt that something was over  one of 
her wings...

She moved again in order to let her arm touch that face, she insticly 
liked calmdown that child. At least she could and carefully she 
touched kindly with her fingers Trinitry's cheek

Windlord when he saw that Trynitry fell inside the pod he dificulty 
stand up and webt towards the pod to ree them.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> She felt the bot move a little. She couldn't really see what was 
> happening, she tried to move, but was stuck between the bot and the 
> side of the pod.  She screamed again,"AHHHHHHHHH!!"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > ::Nightlight::
> > 
> > She was to weak to understand what was going on there, she had 
been 
> > sleeping to much time, and wake up and defend herself wouldn't be 
> > easy. Sudden something  fell in her lap and roll towards her 
head. 
> > She could heard a scream and it made her react, trying to open 
her 
> > bright cyan eyes while she slowly moved again trying to open the 
> pod 
> > door but few plants still were bloked it while a scarse light 
fell 
> > inside pod...
